verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> I will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> from <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> my <S%H5828>help.<s%>
My <S%H5828>help<s%> comes from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He will not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> to be <S%H4132>moved:<s%> he that <S%H8104>keeps<s%> you will not <S%H5123>slumber.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is your <S%H8104>keeper:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is your <S%H6738>shade<s%> on your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall not <S%H5221>smite<s%> you by <S%H3119>day,<s%> nor the <S%H3394>moon<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H8104>preserve<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> he shall <S%H8104>preserve<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H8104>preserve<s%> your <S%H3318>going<s%> out and your <S%H935>coming<s%> in from this time forth, and even for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>
